desc: Nationally recognized sculptor Lynn Fraley creates dynamic, hyper-realistic sculptures of numerous types of horses. The equine sculpture you see here is created in Boise, Idaho and collected by horse lovers the world over.

layout.text:
Nationally recognized sculptor Lynn Fraley 
creates dynamic, realistic sculptures
of all types of horses. The equine
sculpture you see here is created in
Boise, Idaho and collected by horse
lovers the world over.
